me wana wita thama “idiri aathma thunakata athiwana paridi thama dhanaya upaya atha ”yi nihathamani aadambarayakin yuthuwa pawasana pawulo koyiyoge “jiwitha wandanawaka satahan ” sabawinma , “wadakata athi ” ekadu kruthiyak ho paryeshanayak ho kara nathi namuth thaman sathu asimitha dhanaye mahimayen thama hithawathun lawa charithakatha liya ganiminda , thama sakkuwata damaganimata samathwu jarapath aacharyawarun lawa thama pal haliwalata pa්rasasthi liya ganiminda wajambaena , aathma thunakata nowa aathma hathakata sarilana paridi dhanaya pamanak raskara athi ape sahithya mudalalilata (mewan pothak kiyawimata welawak saha aashawak da abamal renuwaka ho hrudasakshiyak da athnam) pa්rabala athulpaharak labadenawata kisindu sakayak natha.
mudala matha diwena samajayaka manushyathwaya, sadharanathwaya, samagriya pawa me siyalla parihaniyata path wi atha.

me anuwa lankawe prachalithawa pawathina samalingikathwaya yanu rogayaki,mano wyadhiyaki wani adahas ee pilibada wana sampurna nodanuwathkama saha poduwe merata samajaye pasugamithwaya matha adhipathithwayata pathwu eewa wethi.yameku ohuge ho ayage aagama,warnaya,jathiya matha konkirimata lakkirima waradi wanne yam seda yamekuge lingika waranaya matha ohuwa wenaskota salakimada niwaradi nowe.oonama minis samajayaka menma lankaweth samalingika hasirim sahitha piris jiwath wu athara adada jiwath wethi.eya hudek owunge pawathme aakaraya misa aswabhawika yamak nowe.kesewuwada lankawe danda nithi sangrahaye 365 waganthiya prakarawa samalingikathwaya dandaniya waradaki.nithiye sita janamadhya dakwa siyaluma nila wyuhayan wishama lingika eekadhikaraya matha samalingikathwaya bahara kirime padanama matha godanagi atha.

athamwitakadi thamata sathuru pudgalayekuge maranayak ho wipathak pilibanda athiwana sanjananaya nisa pudgalayata sathutakpawa athiwe.ewita eki chiththawegaya dhanathmaka hadathala daruwada, eya dhanathmaka chiththawegayak se salakima waradiya.manda kisiyam ayekuge maranaya ha wipatha thawath pudgalayekuta sathutakwima sadacharathmaka aakalpa ha charya pilibanda wishwadharmathawaya emangin ullanghanayawana bawini.samaharu nodannakama nisa waradikrithaya kara sathutu wanuye me bawa nodannakama nisaya.chiththawegaya hondabawe lakshana daru pamanin eya honda chiththa wegayak bawa nosithiyayuthuya.waradide sidukara sathutak labimata huruwima dhanathmaka chiththawegayak nowe.
